description: Claude Code Hooks for EROS Self-Improving Skills System

session_end.description: Auto-reflect when Claude Code session ends. Triggers skill reflection process to capture learnings, update skill confidence scores, and identify improvement opportunities. Toggleable via AUTO_REFLECT environment variable.

schedule_generated.description: Capture validation feedback after successful schedule generation. Records validation results, error patterns, and success metrics to inform future skill improvements.

weekly_performance.description: Batch performance feedback collection. Runs every Monday at 9 AM to aggregate weekly performance metrics, identify trends, and update skill evolution recommendations.
